## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar. The overall design is simple and striking, with high contrast between the yellow and black colors, making the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 2 PREMIUM FJ Sagen Sie Verschmutzungen „goodbye“: Mit dem Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Premium FJ halten Sie Ihr Haus, rund um die Gartenmöbel und kleineren Gartenflächen, sauber. Inkl. Schaumdüse. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.673-537.0 ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155689
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa max. 110 / max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,4
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6,5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 242 × 285 × 790
## Ausstattung
Schaumdüse [ ]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo gebrauchsfertig RM 562
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
1-fach-Strahlrohr [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 4
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [ ]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [ ]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [ ]
## Description The image shows a pressure washer set, which includes several components: - **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It has a handle on top for easy transportation. - The unit is equipped with wheels for mobility. - There are two yellow clips on the sides, likely for holding accessories. - **Accessories**: - **Hose**: A coiled black hose is included, used to connect the pressure washer to the spray gun. - **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow spray gun is present, which attaches to the hose for directing water flow. - **Lance Attachments**: Two lance attachments are provided, one with a pointed nozzle and another with a wider nozzle for different spray patterns. - **Detergent Bottle**: A small white bottle with a black cap, likely for holding cleaning detergent. - **Cleaning Solution**: A bottle of cleaning solution is included, with a label indicating it is for use with the pressure washer. This set is designed for cleaning tasks, such as washing cars, patios, or outdoor furniture. The combination of the pressure washer and various attachments allows for versatile cleaning applications. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall design uses a combination of blue, white, and gold colors. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, eye-catching design. It features a large numeral "1" on the left side, which is partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this numeral, there is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND** This text is in uppercase, emphasizing the prominence and importance of the message. The use of contrasting colors—gray for the numeral and yellow for the arrow—draws attention to the claim of being the top brand in its category. The overall design suggests a focus on branding and market leadership. ## Description The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with an arrow pointing upwards, symbolizing an increase or enhancement. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests a theme of increased power or efficiency, possibly related to a product or feature enhancement. The use of bold colors and simple imagery emphasizes the message of power augmentation. I'm unable to accurately read the text from the image provided. The text appears to be blurred or unclear. If you can provide a clearer image or more context, I'd be happy to help further!

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar. The overall design is simple and striking, with high contrast between the yellow and black colors, making the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 2 PREMIUM FJ

Sagen Sie Verschmutzungen „goodbye“: Mit dem Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Premium FJ halten Sie Ihr Haus, rund um die Gartenmöbel und kleineren Gartenflächen, sauber. Inkl. Schaumdüse.

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155689
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa max. 110 / max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,4
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6,5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 242 × 285 × 790

## Ausstattung
Schaumdüse [ ]
Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo gebrauchsfertig RM 562
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
1-fach-Strahlrohr [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 4
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [ ]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [ ]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [ ]

## Description

The image shows a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

- **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
  - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
  - It has a handle on top for easy transportation.
  - The unit is equipped with wheels for mobility.
  - There are two yellow clips on the sides, likely for holding accessories.

- **Accessories**:
  - **Hose**: A coiled black hose is included, used to connect the pressure washer to the spray gun.
  - **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow spray gun is present, which attaches to the hose for directing water flow.
  - **Lance Attachments**: Two lance attachments are provided, one with a pointed nozzle and another with a wider nozzle for different spray patterns.
  - **Detergent Bottle**: A small white bottle with a black cap, likely for holding cleaning detergent.
  - **Cleaning Solution**: A bottle of cleaning solution is included, with a label indicating it is for use with the pressure washer.

This set is designed for cleaning tasks, such as washing cars, patios, or outdoor furniture. The combination of the pressure washer and various attachments allows for versatile cleaning applications.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The overall design uses a combination of blue, white, and gold colors. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, eye-catching design. It features a large numeral "1" on the left side, which is partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this numeral, there is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND**

This text is in uppercase, emphasizing the prominence and importance of the message. The use of contrasting colors—gray for the numeral and yellow for the arrow—draws attention to the claim of being the top brand in its category. The overall design suggests a focus on branding and market leadership.

## Description

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with an arrow pointing upwards, symbolizing an increase or enhancement. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests a theme of increased power or efficiency, possibly related to a product or feature enhancement. The use of bold colors and simple imagery emphasizes the message of power augmentation.
I'm unable to accurately read the text from the image provided. The text appears to be blurred or unclear. If you can provide a clearer image or more context, I'd be happy to help further!
